entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 30%
